text:
Lil Cory (born September 12, 1991) is an American actor and rapper.
Career.
In 2012 while signed to Def Jam he released “Thug Motivation” featuring Young Jeezy and in 2019 he was discovered by multi-platinum Grammy award-winning producer Jared Lee Gosselin.
Guest on All Night Nippon Radio in Tokyo, Japan.
He played on Star Trek: Picard on CBS All Access and has appeared on shows such as American Idol and E! Live from the red carpet.
